00011 EnergyScaleCorrection_class::EnergyScaleCorrection_class(TString correctionFileName, 
00012                                                          TString smearingFileName):
00013   noCorrections(true), noSmearings(true), 
00014   rgen_(NULL)
00015 {
00016   if(smearingFileName.Sizeof()>1) noSmearings=false;
00017   else noSmearings=true;
00018 
00019   if(correctionFileName.Sizeof()>1) noCorrections=false;
00020   else noCorrections=true;
00021 
00022   if(!noCorrections){
00023     ReadFromFile(correctionFileName);
00024     if(scales.empty()){
00025       std::cerr << "[ERROR] scale correction map empty" << std::endl;
00026       noCorrections=true;
00027       exit(1);
00028     }
00029   }
00030   
00031   if(!noSmearings){
00032     ReadSmearingFromFile(smearingFileName);
00033     if(smearings.empty()){
00034       std::cerr << "[ERROR] scale correction map empty" << std::endl;
00035       noCorrections=true;
00036       exit(1);
00037     }
00038   }
00039   rgen_=new TRandom3(0); // inizializzo il generatore con seed impostato sull'ora
00040 
00041   return;
00042 }

00050   
00051 float EnergyScaleCorrection_class::getScaleOffset(int runNumber, bool isEBEle, double R9Ele, double etaSCEle, double EtEle){
00052   if(noCorrections) return 1;
00053   
00054   correctionCategory_class category(runNumber, etaSCEle, R9Ele, EtEle);
00055   correction_map_t::const_iterator corr_itr = scales.find(category);
00056   if(corr_itr==scales.end()){ // if not in the standard classes, add it in the list of not defined classes
00057     if(scales_not_defined.count(category)==0){
00058       correctionValue_class corr;
00059       scales_not_defined[category]=corr;
00060     }
00061     corr_itr = scales_not_defined.find(category);
00062     //     std::cout << "[ERROR] Category not found: " << std::endl;
00063     //     std::cout << category << std::endl;
00064     //     exit(1);
00065   }
00066 
00067 #ifdef DEBUG
00068   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Checking correction for category: " << category << std::endl;
00069   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Correction is: " << corr_itr->second
00070             << std::endl 
00071             << "        given for category " <<  corr_itr->first;
00072 #endif
00073 
00074   return corr_itr->second.scale;
00075 
00076 }
00077 
00078 void EnergyScaleCorrection_class::Add(TString category_, int runMin_, int runMax_, double deltaP_, double err_deltaP_){
00079 
00080   correctionCategory_class cat(category_);
00081   cat.runmin=runMin_;
00082   cat.runmax=runMax_;
00083 
00084   if(scales.count(cat)!=0){
00085     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Category already defined!" << std::endl;
00086     std::cerr << "        Adding category:  " << cat << std::endl;
00087     std::cerr << "        Defined category: " << scales[cat] << std::endl;
00088     exit(1);
00089   }
00090 
00091   correctionValue_class corr;
00092   corr.scale=deltaP_;
00093   corr.scale_err=err_deltaP_;
00094   scales[cat]=corr;
00095 
00096   std::cout << "[INFO:scale correction] " << cat << corr << std::endl;
00097   return;
00098 }

00100 void EnergyScaleCorrection_class::ReadFromFile(TString filename){
00101   std::cout << "[STATUS] Reading recalibration values from file: " << filename << std::endl;
00102   ifstream f_in(filename);
00103   if(!f_in.good()){
00104     std::cerr << "[ERROR] file " << filename << " not readable" << std::endl;
00105     exit(1);
00106     return;
00107   }
00108   
00109   int runMin, runMax;
00110   TString category, region2;
00111   double deltaP, err_deltaP;
00112 
00113 
00114   for(f_in >> category; f_in.good(); f_in >> category){
00115     f_in >> region2 
00116          >> runMin >> runMax 
00117          >> deltaP >> err_deltaP;
00118 
00119     Add(category, runMin, runMax, deltaP, err_deltaP);
00120   }
00121   
00122   f_in.close();
00123 
00124   return;
00125 }

00132 TTree *EnergyScaleCorrection_class::GetCorrTree(TChain *tree, bool fastLoop, 
00133                                                 TString runNumberBranchName,
00134                                                 TString R9EleBranchName,
00135                                                 TString etaEleBranchName,
00136                                                 TString etaSCEleBranchName,
00137                                                 TString energySCEleBranchName,
00138                                                 TString nPVBranchName
00139                                                 ){
00140   float nPVmean = 0;
00141 //   if(correctionType.Contains("nPV"))
00142 //     nPVmean = GetMean_nPV(tree, fastLoop,nPVBranchName);
00143 
00144   Int_t nPV_;
00145   Int_t runNumber_;
00146   Float_t etaEle_[2];
00147   Float_t etaSCEle_[2];
00148   Float_t R9Ele_[2];
00149   Float_t energySCEle_[2];
00150 
00151   Float_t scaleEle_[2];
00152 
00153   TTree *newTree = new TTree("scaleEle",""); //+correctionType,correctionType);
00154   newTree->Branch("scaleEle", scaleEle_, "scaleEle[2]/F");
00155 
00156   if(fastLoop){
00157     tree->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00158     tree->SetBranchStatus(runNumberBranchName,1);
00159     tree->SetBranchStatus(etaEleBranchName,1);
00160     tree->SetBranchStatus(etaSCEleBranchName,1);
00161     tree->SetBranchStatus(energySCEleBranchName,1);
00162     tree->SetBranchStatus(R9EleBranchName,1);
00163     tree->SetBranchStatus(nPVBranchName,1);
00164   }
00165 
00166   tree->SetBranchAddress(nPVBranchName, &nPV_);
00167   tree->SetBranchAddress(runNumberBranchName, &runNumber_);
00168   tree->SetBranchAddress(etaEleBranchName,etaEle_);
00169   tree->SetBranchAddress(etaSCEleBranchName,etaSCEle_);
00170   tree->SetBranchAddress(energySCEleBranchName,energySCEle_);
00171   tree->SetBranchAddress(R9EleBranchName, R9Ele_);
00172   Long64_t nentries = tree->GetEntries();
00173 
00174 
00175 
00176   std::cout << "[STATUS] Get scaleEle for tree: " << tree->GetTitle() 
00177             << "\t" << "with " << nentries << " entries" << std::endl;
00178   std::cerr << "[00%]";
00179 
00180   // loop over tree 
00181   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<nentries; ientry++){
00182     tree->GetEntry(ientry);
00183     scaleEle_[0] = ScaleCorrection(runNumber_, fabs(etaSCEle_[0]) < 1.4442, 
00184                                    R9Ele_[0],etaEle_[0], energySCEle_[0]/cosh(etaSCEle_[0]), nPV_, nPVmean);
00185     scaleEle_[1] = ScaleCorrection(runNumber_, fabs(etaSCEle_[1]) < 1.4442, 
00186                                    R9Ele_[1],etaEle_[1], energySCEle_[1]/cosh(etaSCEle_[1]), nPV_, nPVmean);
00187     newTree->Fill();
00188     if(ientry%(nentries/100)==0) std::cerr << "\b\b\b\b" << std::setw(2) << ientry/(nentries/100) << "%]";
00189   }
00190 
00191   
00192   if(fastLoop) tree->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00193   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00194   tree->GetEntry(0);
00195   //  std::cout << "[WARNING] nPU > nPU max for " << warningCounter << " times" << std::endl;
00196   return newTree;
00197 }

00201 //============================== SMEARING
00202 void EnergyScaleCorrection_class::AddSmearing(TString category_, int runMin_, int runMax_, 
00203                                               double constTerm, double err_constTerm, double alpha, double err_alpha){
00204 #ifdef SHERVIN
00205   //double smearing_, double err_smearing_){
00206   // se le corrections non sono definite per Hgg (gold e bad) allora ignoro le righe che si riferiscono a queste categorie
00207   if( (!isHggCat) && (category_.Contains("gold",TString::kIgnoreCase) || category_.Contains("bad",TString::kIgnoreCase))) {
00208     return;
00209   }
00210 
00211   if(smearings.count(category_)!=0){
00212     std::cerr << "[WARNING] duplicated smearing number in input file" << std::endl;
00213     return;
00214   }
00215   correction_t corr;
00216   corr.runMax=runMax_;
00217   std::pair<double,double> pair_tmp;
00218   pair_tmp.first=constTerm;
00219   pair_tmp.second=alpha;
00220   smearings[category_]=pair_tmp; 
00221 #endif
00222 
00223   return;
00224 }

00226 void EnergyScaleCorrection_class::ReadSmearingFromFile(TString filename){
00227 #ifdef SHERVIN
00228   std::cout << "[STATUS] Reading smearing values from file: " << filename << std::endl;
00229   ifstream f_in(filename);
00230   if(!f_in.good()){
00231     std::cerr << "[ERROR] file " << filename << " not readable" << std::endl;
00232     exit(1);
00233   }
00234   
00235   int runMin=0, runMax=900000;
00236   TString category, region2;
00237   //double smearing, err_smearing;
00238   double constTerm, err_constTerm, alpha, err_alpha;
00239 
00240   for(f_in >> category; f_in.good(); f_in >> category){
00241     f_in //>> region2 
00242          //>> runMin >> runMax 
00243       >> constTerm >> alpha;
00244     //>> smearing >> err_smearing;
00245     
00246     AddSmearing(category, runMin, runMax, constTerm,  err_constTerm, alpha, err_alpha);
00247   }
00248   
00249   f_in.close();
00250   //  runCorrection_itr=runMin_map.begin();
00251   
00252   noSmearings=false;
00253 #endif
00254   return;
00255 }

00258 
00259 float EnergyScaleCorrection_class::getSmearingSigma(int runNumber, float energy, bool isEBEle, float R9Ele, float etaSCEle){
00260   
00261   correctionCategory_class category(runNumber, etaSCEle, R9Ele, energy/cosh(etaSCEle));
00262   correction_map_t::const_iterator corr_itr = smearings.find(category);
00263   if(corr_itr==smearings.end()){ // if not in the standard classes, add it in the list of not defined classes
00264     if(smearings_not_defined.count(category)==0){
00265       correctionValue_class corr;
00266       smearings_not_defined[category]=corr;
00267     }
00268     corr_itr = smearings_not_defined.find(category);
00269     //     std::cout << "[ERROR] Category not found: " << std::endl;
00270     //     std::cout << category << std::endl;
00271     //     exit(1);
00272   }
00273 
00274 #ifdef DEBUG
00275   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Checking correction for category: " << category << std::endl;
00276   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Correction is: " << corr_itr->second
00277             << std::endl 
00278             << "        given for category " <<  corr_itr->first;
00279 #endif
00280 
00281   double constTerm=corr_itr->second.constTerm;
00282   double alpha=corr_itr->second.alpha;
00283   return sqrt(constTerm*constTerm + alpha*alpha/energy);
00284 
00285 }
00286 
00287 float EnergyScaleCorrection_class::getSmearing(int runNumber, float energy, bool isEBEle, float R9Ele, float etaSCEle){
00288 
00289   if(noSmearings) return 1;
00290   return rgen_->Gaus(1,getSmearingSigma(runNumber, energy, isEBEle, R9Ele, etaSCEle));
00291 }

00294 TTree *EnergyScaleCorrection_class::GetSmearTree(TChain *tree, bool fastLoop, 
00295                                                  TString energyEleBranchName,
00296                                                  TString runNumberBranchName,
00297                                                  TString R9EleBranchName,
00298                                                  TString etaEleBranchName,
00299                                                  TString etaSCEleBranchName
00300 
00301                                                  ){
00302   Int_t runNumber_;
00303   Float_t energyEle_[2];
00304   Float_t etaEle_[2];
00305   Float_t etaSCEle_[2];
00306   Float_t R9Ele_[2];
00307 
00308   Float_t smearEle_[2];
00309 
00310   TTree *newTree = new TTree("smearEle_",""); //+correctionType,correctionType);
00311   newTree->Branch("smearEle", smearEle_, "smearEle[2]/F");
00312 
00313   if(tree==NULL){
00314     std::cerr << "[ERROR] original chain in GetSmearTree is NULL" << std::endl;
00315     exit(1);
00316   }
00317   if(fastLoop){
00318     tree->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00319     tree->SetBranchStatus(runNumberBranchName,1);
00320     tree->SetBranchStatus(energyEleBranchName,1);
00321     tree->SetBranchStatus(etaEleBranchName,1);
00322     tree->SetBranchStatus(etaSCEleBranchName,1);
00323     tree->SetBranchStatus(R9EleBranchName,1);
00324   }
00325 
00326   tree->SetBranchAddress(runNumberBranchName, &runNumber_);
00327   tree->SetBranchAddress(energyEleBranchName, energyEle_);
00328   tree->SetBranchAddress(etaEleBranchName,etaEle_);
00329   tree->SetBranchAddress(etaSCEleBranchName,etaSCEle_);
00330   tree->SetBranchAddress(R9EleBranchName, R9Ele_);
00331   
00332   // loop over tree 
00333   std::cerr << "Adding smearEle branch \t";
00334   std::cerr << "[00%]";
00335 
00336   Long64_t nentries = tree->GetEntries();
00337   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<tree->GetEntriesFast(); ientry++){
00338     tree->GetEntry(ientry);
00339     smearEle_[0] = getSmearing(runNumber_, energyEle_[0], fabs(etaSCEle_[0]) < 1.4442, 
00340                                R9Ele_[0],etaEle_[0]);
00341     smearEle_[1] = getSmearing(runNumber_, energyEle_[1], fabs(etaSCEle_[1]) < 1.4442, 
00342                                R9Ele_[1],etaEle_[1]);
00343     newTree->Fill();
00344     if(ientry%(nentries/100)==0) std::cerr << "\b\b\b\b" << std::setw(2) << ientry/(nentries/100) << "%]";
00345 
00346   }
00347   std::cerr << std::endl;
00348   
00349   if(fastLoop) tree->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00350   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00351   tree->GetEntry(0);
00352   return newTree;
00353 }

00364   
00365   //  if(correctionType.Contains("nPV",TString::kIgnoreCase)) correction *= 1- (-0.02 * (nPV -nPVmean))/100;
00366

00371 
00372 float EnergyScaleCorrection_class::GetMean_nPV(TChain *tree, bool fastLoop, 
00373                                                 TString nPVBranchName
00374                                                 ){
00375   float nPVmean=0;
00376   Int_t nPV_;
00377   if(fastLoop){
00378     tree->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00379     tree->SetBranchStatus(nPVBranchName,1);
00380   }
00381 
00382   tree->SetBranchAddress(nPVBranchName, &nPV_);
00383   Long64_t nentries = tree->GetEntries();
00384 
00385   // loop over tree 
00386   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<nentries; ientry++){
00387     tree->GetEntry(ientry);
00388     nPVmean+=nPV_;
00389   }
00390   nPVmean/=nentries;
00391   
00392   if(fastLoop) tree->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00393   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00394   tree->GetEntry(0);
00395   //  std::cout << "[WARNING] nPU > nPU max for " << warningCounter << " times" << std::endl;
00396   return nPVmean;
00397 }

00399 
00400 bool correctionCategory_class::operator<(const correctionCategory_class& b) const{
00401     if(runmin < b.runmin && runmax < b.runmax) return true;  
00402     if(runmax > b.runmax && runmin > b.runmin) return false; 
00403        
00404     if(etamin < b.etamin && etamax<b.etamax) return true; 
00405     if(etamax > b.etamax && etamin>b.etamin) return false;
00406        
00407     if(r9min  < b.r9min && r9max < b.r9max) return true; 
00408     if(r9max  > b.r9max && r9min > b.r9min) return  false;
00409        
00410     if(etmin  < b.etmin && etmax < b.etmax) return true;  
00411     if(etmax  > b.etmax && etmin > b.etmin) return  false;
00412     return false;
00413 
00414   };    
00415 
00416 correctionCategory_class::correctionCategory_class(TString category_){
00417     std::string category(category_.Data());
00418 #ifdef DEBUG
00419     std::cout << "[DEBUG] correctionClass defined for category: " << category << std::endl;
00420 #endif
00421     // default values 
00422     runmin=0; runmax=999999;
00423     etamin=-1;etamax=10;
00424     r9min=-1;r9max=10;
00425     etmin=-1;etmax=300.;
00426     
00427     size_t p1,p2; // boundary
00428 
00429     // eta region
00430     p1 = category.find("absEta_");
00431     p2 = p1+1;
00432     if(category.find("absEta_0_1")!=std::string::npos){ etamin=0; etamax=1;}
00433     else if(category.find("absEta_1_1.4442")!=std::string::npos){ etamin=1; etamax=1.4442; }
00434     else if(category.find("absEta_1.566_2")!=std::string::npos){ etamin=1.566; etamax=2;}
00435     else if(category.find("absEta_2_2.5")!=std::string::npos){ etamin=2; etamax=2.5;}
00436     else{
00437       if(p1!=std::string::npos){ 
00438         p1 = category.find("_",p1);
00439         p2 = category.find("_",p1+1);
00440         etamin = TString(category.substr(p1+1, p2-p1-1)).Atof();
00441         p1 = p2;
00442         p2 = category.find("-",p1); 
00443         etamax = TString(category.substr(p1+1, p2-p1-1)).Atof();
00444       }
00445     }
00446 
00447     // Et region
00448     p1 = category.find("-Et_");
00449     p2 = p1+1;
00450     //    std::cout << "p1 = " << p1 << "\t" << std::string::npos << "\t" << category.size() << std::endl;
00451     //std::cout << etmin << "\t" << etmax << "\t" << category.substr(p1+1, p2-p1-1) << "\t" << p1 << "\t" << p2 << std::endl;
00452     if(p1 !=std::string::npos){ 
00453       p1 = category.find("_",p1);
00454       p2 = category.find("_",p1+1);
00455       etmin = TString(category.substr(p1+1, p2-p1-1)).Atof();
00456       p1 = p2;
00457       p2 = category.find("-",p1); 
00458       etmax = TString(category.substr(p1+1, p2-p1-1)).Atof();
00459       std::cout << etmin << "\t" << etmax << "\t" << category.substr(p1+1, p2-p1-1) << std::endl;
00460     }
00461 
00462     if(category.find("gold")!=std::string::npos){ r9min=0.94; r9max=10;}
00463     else if(category.find("bad")!=std::string::npos){ r9min=-1; r9max=0.94;};
00464     
00465 };
